description:
There`s chaos in the capital when Princess http://anidb.net/ch114633 [Fine] returns from war. Due to some trickery, the citizens of Lutoh have turned against her and are demanding the princess` head.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Shikumareta Douran wa Nani o Umu no ka
仕組まれた動乱は何を生むのか
